bookmark_20250715_061434_42370538.text: Electric autonomous buses featuring wireless charging pads at every bus stop, combined with solar panels on bus roofs and regenerative braking systems. The buses would use AI-optimized routes based on real-time traffic and passenger demand, reducing energy consumption by 40% and increasing service efficiency.
bookmark_20250715_061434_42370538.critique: Excellent comprehensive solution with clear benefits
bookmark_20250715_061434_42370538.advocacy: This solution addresses multiple sustainability challenges simultaneously
bookmark_20250715_061434_42370538.skepticism: High initial infrastructure costs may be a barrier

bookmark_20250715_061434_ad52aac4.text: A simple test idea that is long enough
